Segment.name: BCS
Segment.comment: To indicate the beginning of the Project Cost Reporting Transaction Set and provide information identifying a program name, number, contract type, and security classification

Field.name: TransactionSetPurposeCode
Field.comment: Code identifying purpose of transaction set

Field.name: Date1
Field.comment: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

Field.name: Date2
Field.comment: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

Field.name: Description
Field.comment: A free-form description to clarify the related data elements and their content

Field.name: ReferenceIdentification
Field.comment: Reference information as defined for a particular Transaction Set or as specified by the Reference Identification Qualifier

Field.name: SecurityLevelCode
Field.comment: Code indicating the level of confidentiality assigned by the sender to the information following

Field.name: CompositeUnitOfMeasure
Field.comment: To identify a composite unit of measure (See Figures Appendix for examples of use)
